meta.title: Golden Retriever Noise Anxiety: Thunder & Fireworks
meta.description: Help your Golden Retriever cope with loud noises like thunder and fireworks. Effective calming strategies and desensitization tips.

h1: Helping a Golden Retriever with Noise Anxiety

solutions.title: Create a Safe Space
solutions.description: Soundproof a room or use a crate covered with heavy blankets.

solutions.title: White Noise
solutions.description: Use fans or calming music to mask the scary sounds.

solutions.title: Thundershirt
solutions.description: Pressure wraps can provide a calming effect.
